rows.label: qst106022_msg0001
rows.name:
Hmm, ancient civilizations...
Truly fascinating, mo.

rows.label: qst106022_msg0002
rows.name:
It seems you were able to understand
the text on the blackboard, mo.

rows.label: qst106022_msg0003
rows.name:
Yes, the knowledge and technology
of the ancients, the accumulation
and changes from the past...

rows.label: qst106022_msg0004
rows.name:
...have created the world
that we live in today, mo.

rows.label: qst106022_msg0006
rows.name:
You've brilliantly cleared the
third period class as well, mo.

rows.label: qst106022_msg0007
rows.name:
Only the fourth period remains,
mo. Keep up this pace and
you'll overcome it, mo!
